 177:     '''

 191:     '''
 192: Loop over all elements (channels) of the input polarimetric matrix. Filter the current polarimetric element as follows:

+197:     cdef double sigma = 0

 276:     '''

 294:     '''
 295:     img : array-like
 296:         array with shape (z,y,x) where the channel varies along z
 297:     '''
+298:     cdef int L = NUMLK
  __pyx_v_L = __pyx_v_NUMLK;

+299:     cdef int N = WINSIZE
  __pyx_v_N = __pyx_v_WINSIZE;

+300:     cdef int m = (N - 3) / 2   # offset to calculate mean value
  __pyx_v_m = __Pyx_div_long((__pyx_v_N - 3), 2);

+301:     cdef int n = (N - 1) / 2   # length of filter kernel on either side of centre
  __pyx_v_n = __Pyx_div_long((__pyx_v_N - 1), 2);
